name: Cantsteroid
description:
Your Mission: Survive as long as possible.

How to play:

  1. Move the mouse around to command the spaceship to move.
  2. Left click to shoot.
  3. Click the button to repair the engine if it is broken.

Have fun!

SFX credit: 512 Sound Effects (8-bit style) by SubspaceAudio (opengameart)
